name: Simple Wii Series Vol. 2: The Minna de Bass Tsuri Taikai
overview: Simple Wii Series Vol. 2: The Minna de Bass Tsuri Taikai (SIMPLE Wiiシリーズ Vol.2 THE みんなでバス釣り大会) is the second work of the "Simple Wii Series", the operation of the game is optimized according to the unique operation mode of the Wii, making fishing easier. The player only needs to swing the Wiimote according to the arrow on the right side of the screen to pull the fish, and then use the controller to turn the fish out of the water! There is a ranking via Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection. You can compare the fish that you catch with other players.
